post.body: @loyalKNG LMAO he would make a tasty snack ;)
that and who should I eat to get energy??? Seriously... who is a good candidate?
maybe its redbull time!?
No time for a nap!! I actually need to get in the shower like 10 minutes ago!!! haha
They are all such great lessons who could choose just one???
oh I love it on my iPhone :) It keeps me from being bored at work.
twitterrific rocks I love it :) you should too
I know it feels like I have been here forever. I will be home in 5 minutes though. :)
anytime :)
haha I was sending you some
http://twitpic.com/z4qd - if you can't see it, it says 213
Zoom in and look at the score on the top. I did that http://twitpic.com/z4qd
omg i just sat on my glasses!!!!!!! good thing they are okay. that was almost bad.
Okay time to head to the bowling alley and kicks some male butt at bowling!!!!! Catch ya on twitterrific while I am out.
Ok. Now I am REALLY unmotivated.
Oh darn, I have to procrastinate a little more because someone brought pizza home and now I am forced (HAHA) to eat it.
Okay I am now motivated and getting my lazy up and doing the shit that needs to get done. Thanks for the motivation.
I have so much crap to do tonight and I have no energy at the moment. I think I need some helpful words of motivation :) Anyone????
FINALLY HOME FROM A LONG ASS DAY
45 minutes and I can go home!! Yay!!!
